mapper.select: SELECT m.name AS memberName, m.phone AS memberPhone, 1 As count, pp.totalCount, ps.sessionDate, ps.sessionTime FROM pt_package pp INNER JOIN member m ON pp.memberId = m.memberId INNER JOIN pt_session ps ON pp.packageId = ps.packageId LEFT OUTER JOIN attendance a ON ps.sessionId = a.sessionId WHERE a.attendanceId IS NULL AND pp.isActive = TRUE AND ps.sessionDate = ( SELECT MIN(ps2.sessionDate) FROM pt_session ps2 LEFT JOIN attendance a2 ON ps2.sessionId = a2.sessionId WHERE ps2.packageId = pp.packageId AND a2.attendanceId IS NULL ) ORDER BY ps.sessionDate ASC, ps.sessionTime ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pt_package (memberId, trainerId, productId, totalCount, remainingCount,startDate, endDate, price, created_at, isActive) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{trainerId}, #{productId}, #{totalCount}, #{remainingCount}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{price}, #{createdAt}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE pt_package SET isActive = false WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND isActive = true AND paymentId IS NULL
UPDATE pt_package SET isActive = true WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND isActive = false

UPDATE pt_package SET trainerId = #{trainerId}, productId = #{productId}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, totalCount = #{totalCount}, remainingCount = #{remainingCount}, price = #{price} WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.name AS memberName, m.phone AS memberPhone, 1 As count, pp.totalCount, ps.sessionDate, ps.sessionTime FROM pt_package pp INNER JOIN member m ON pp.memberId = m.memberId INNER JOIN pt_session ps ON pp.packageId = ps.packageId LEFT OUTER JOIN attendance a ON ps.sessionId = a.sessionId WHERE a.attendanceId IS NULL AND pp.isActive = TRUE AND ps.sessionDate = ( SELECT MIN(ps2.sessionDate) FROM pt_session ps2 LEFT JOIN attendance a2 ON ps2.sessionId = a2.sessionId WHERE ps2.packageId = pp.packageId AND a2.attendanceId IS NULL ) AND m.name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY ps.sessionDate ASC, ps.sessionTime ASC;

SELECT m.name AS memberName, m.phone AS memberPhone, 1 As count, pp.totalCount, ps.sessionDate, ps.sessionTime FROM pt_package pp INNER JOIN member m ON pp.memberId = m.memberId INNER JOIN pt_session ps ON pp.packageId = ps.packageId LEFT OUTER JOIN attendance a ON ps.sessionId = a.sessionId WHERE a.attendanceId IS NULL AND pp.isActive = TRUE AND ps.sessionDate = ( SELECT MIN(ps2.sessionDate) FROM pt_session ps2 LEFT JOIN attendance a2 ON ps2.sessionId = a2.sessionId WHERE ps2.packageId = pp.packageId AND a2.attendanceId IS NULL ) AND m.phone LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY ps.sessionDate ASC, ps.sessionTime ASC;

SELECT p.memberId, m.name, m.phone, m.birthDate, p.totalCount, p.remainingCount, p.startDate, p.endDate, p.packageId FROM pt_package p INNER JOIN member m ON p.memberId = m.memberId WHERE p.trainerId = #{trainerId} AND p.endDate > NOW() ORDER BY m.name
mapper.update: UPDATE pt_package SET remainingCount = remainingCount - 1 WHERE packageId = #{packageId} AND remainingCount > 0
UPDATE pt_package SET remainingCount = remainingCount + 1 WHERE packageId = #{packageId} AND totalCount > remainingCount
mapper.select: SELECT top 1 memberId, trainerId, productId, totalCount, remainingCount, startDate, endDate, price FROM pt_package WHERE memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY endDate DESC
SELECT top 1 memberId, trainerId, productId, totalCount, remainingCount, startDate, endDate, price FROM pt_package WHERE packageId = #{packageId} ORDER BY endDate DESC

SELECT p.name AS productName, COUNT(pp.packageId) AS count, COALESCE(p.price, 0) AS unitPrice, COALESCE(SUM(pp.price), 0) AS totalAmount FROM product p LEFT JOIN pt_package pp ON pp.productId = p.productId AND pp.startDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} WHERE p.type = 'PT' GROUP BY p.name, p.price ORDER BY p.name
